00020 
00021 inline float hypot( float a, float b )
00022 {
00024         if ( a == 0.0f )
00025                 return Abs( b );
00026 
00028         double c = b / ( double )a;
00029         return ( float )( AbsD( a ) * SqrtD( 1.0 + c*c ) );
00030 }
00031 
00032 inline float AbsMax5( float a, float b, float c, float d, float e )
00033 {
00034         return Max( Max( Max( Max( Abs( a ), Abs( b ) ), Abs( c ) ), Abs( d ) ), Abs( e ) );
00035 }

00046 MSVD::MSVD( const MVec3* matrixMx3, unsigned int rowCount )
00047 : _U( 0 )
00048 , _rowCount( rowCount )
00049 {
00051         B_ASSERT( rowCount >= 3 );
00052 
00053         int m = rowCount;
00054         int n = 3;
00055         int nu = 3;
00056 
00057         _U = new MVec3[ m ];
00058         float e[ 3 ];
00059 
00061         float* work = new float[ m ];
00062         MVec3* A = new MVec3[ rowCount ];
00063         MemSet( work, 0, m * sizeof( float ) );
00064         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < rowCount; ++i )
00065                 A[ i ] = matrixMx3[ i ];
00066 
00067         int wantu = 1;                                          /* boolean */
00068         int wantv = 1;                                          /* boolean */
00069         int i=0, j=0, k=0;
00070 
00073         int nct = min( m-1, n );
00074         int nrt = max( 0, min( n-2, m ) );
00075         for ( k = 0; k < max( nct, nrt ); ++k )
00076         {
00077                 if ( k < nct )
00078                 {
00082                         _s[ k ] = 0.0f;
00083                         for (i = k; i < m; i++) {
00084                                 _s[ k ] = hypot( _s[ k ], A[ i ][ k ] );
00085                         }
00086                         if ( _s[ k ] != 0.0f )
00087                         {
00088                                 if ( A[ k ][ k ] < 0.0f )
00089                                 {
00090                                         _s[ k ] = -_s[ k ];
00091                                 }
00092                                 for ( i = k; i < m; ++i )
00093                                 {
00094                                         A[ i ][ k ] /= _s[ k ];
00095                                 }
00096                                 A[ k ][ k ] += 1.0f;
00097                         }
00098                         _s[ k ] = -_s[ k ];
00099                 }
00100                 for ( j = k+1; j < n; ++j )
00101                 {
00102                         if ( ( k < nct ) && ( _s[k] != 0.0f ) )
00103                         {
00105                                 float t = 0.0f;
00106                                 for ( i = k; i < m; ++i )
00107                                         t += A[ i ][ k ] * A[ i ][ j ];
00108                                 t = -t / A[ k ][ k ];
00109                                 for ( i = k; i < m; ++i )
00110                                         A[ i ][ j ] += t * A[ i ][ k ];
00111             }
00112 
00115                         e[ j ] = A[ k ][ j ];
00116                 }
00117                 if ( wantu & ( k < nct ) )
00118                 {
00121             for ( i = k; i < m; ++i )
00122                _U[ i ][ k ] = A[ i ][ k ];
00123                 }
00124                 if ( k < nrt )
00125                 {
00129                         e[ k ] = 0;
00130                         for ( i = k+1; i < n; ++i )
00131                         {
00132                                 e[ k ] = hypot( e[ k ], e[ i ] );
00133                         }
00134             if ( e[ k ] != 0.0f )
00135                         {
00136                                 if ( e[ k+1 ] < 0.0f )
00137                                 {
00138                                         e[ k ] = -e[ k ];
00139                                 }
00140                                 for ( i = k+1; i < n; ++i )
00141                                 {
00142                                         e[ i ] /= e[ k ];
00143                                 }
00144                                 e[ k+1 ] += 1.0;
00145             }
00146             e[ k ] = -e[ k ];
00147             if ( ( k+1 < m ) & ( e[ k ] != 0.0f) )
00148                         {
00150                                 for ( i = k+1; i < m; ++i )
00151                                         work[ i ] = 0.0f;
00152 
00153                                 for ( j = k+1; j < n; ++j )
00154                                 {
00155                                         for ( i = k+1; i < m; ++i )
00156                                                 work[ i ] += e[ j ] * A[ i ][ j ];
00157                                 }
00158                                 for ( j = k+1; j < n; ++j )
00159                                 {
00160                                         float t = -e[ j ] / e[ k + 1 ];
00161                                         for ( i = k+1; i < m; ++i )
00162                                                 A[ i ][ j ] += t * work[ i ];
00163                                 }
00164             }
00165             if ( wantv )
00166                         {
00169                                 for ( i = k+1; i < n; ++i )
00170                                         _V( i, k ) = e[ i ];
00171             }
00172                 }
00173         }
00174 
00176         int p = min( n, m+1 );
00177         if ( nct < n )
00178                 _s[ nct ] = A[ nct ][ nct ];
00179         if ( m < p )
00180                 _s[ p-1 ] = 0.0f;
00181         if ( nrt+1 < p )
00182                 e[ nrt ] = A[ nrt ][ p - 1 ];
00183         e[ p - 1 ] = 0.0f;
00184 
00186         if ( wantu )
00187         {
00188                 for ( j = nct; j < nu; ++j )
00189                 {
00190                         for ( i = 0; i < m; ++i )
00191                                 _U[ i ][ j ] = 0.0f;
00192                         _U[ j ][ j ] = 1.0f;
00193                 }
00194                 for ( k = nct-1; k >= 0; --k )
00195                 {
00196                         if ( _s[ k ] != 0.0f )
00197                         {
00198                                 for ( j = k+1; j < nu; ++j )
00199                                 {
00200                                         float t = 0.0f;
00201                                         for ( i = k; i < m; ++i )
00202                                                 t += _U[ i ][ k ] * _U[ i ][ j ];
00203                                         t = -t / _U[ k ][ k ];
00204                                         for ( i = k; i < m; ++i )
00205                                                 _U[ i ][ j ] += t * _U[ i ][ k ];
00206                                 }
00207                                 for (i = k; i < m; ++i )
00208                                         _U[ i ][ k ] = -_U[ i ][ k ];
00209 
00210                                 _U[ k ][ k ] = 1.0f + _U[ k ][ k ];
00211                                 for ( i = 0; i < k-1; ++i )
00212                                         _U[ i ][ k ] = 0.0f;
00213                         }
00214                         else
00215                         {
00216                                 for ( i = 0; i < m; ++i )
00217                                         _U[ i ][ k ] = 0.0f;
00218                                 _U[ k ][ k ] = 1.0f;
00219                         }
00220                 }
00221         }
00222 
00224         if ( wantv )
00225         {
00226                 for ( k = n-1; k >= 0; --k )
00227                 {
00228                         if ( ( k < nrt ) & ( e[ k ] != 0.0f ) )
00229                         {
00230                                 for ( j = k+1; j < nu; ++j )
00231                                 {
00232                                         float t = 0.0f;
00233                                         for ( i = k+1; i < n; ++i )
00234                                                 t += _V( i, k ) * _V( i, j );
00235                                         t = -t / _V( k+1, k );
00236                                         for ( i = k+1; i < n; ++i )
00237                                                 _V( i, j ) += t * _V( i, k );
00238                                 }
00239                         }
00240                         for ( i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00241                                 _V( i, k ) = 0.0f;
00242                         _V( k, k ) = 1.0f;
00243                 }
00244         }
00245 
00247         int pp = p - 1;
00248         int iter = 0;
00249         float eps = Pow( 2.0f, -52.0f );
00250         while ( p > 0 )
00251         {
00252                 int k=0;
00253                 int kase=0;
00254 
00256 
00260 
00266 
00267                 for ( k = p-2; k >= -1; --k )
00268                 {
00269                         if ( k == -1 )
00270                                 break;
00271 
00272                         if ( Abs( e[ k ] ) <= eps * ( Abs( _s[ k ] ) + Abs( _s[ k + 1 ] ) ) )
00273                         {
00274                                 e[ k ] = 0.0f;
00275                                 break;
00276                         }
00277                 }
00278                 if ( k == ( p - 2 ) )
00279                 {
00280                         kase = 4;
00281                 }
00282                 else
00283                 {
00284                         int ks;
00285                         for ( ks = p - 1; ks >= k; --ks )
00286                         {
00287                                 if ( ks == k )
00288                                         break;
00289 
00290                                 float t = ( ( ( ks != p    ) ? Abs( e[ ks - 0 ] ) : 0.0f ) + 
00291                                                         ( ( ks != k + 1 ) ? Abs( e[ ks - 1 ] ) : 0.0f ) );
00292                                 if ( Abs( _s[ ks ] ) <= eps * t )
00293                                 {
00294                                         _s[ ks ] = 0.0f;
00295                                         break;
00296                                 }
00297                         }
00298                         if ( ks == k )
00299                         {
00300                                 kase = 3;
00301                         }
00302                         else if ( ks == p-1 )
00303                         {
00304                                 kase = 1;
00305                         }
00306                         else
00307                         {
00308                                 kase = 2;
00309                                 k = ks;
00310                         }
00311                 }
00312                 k++;
00313 
00315                 switch ( kase )
00316                 {
00317                         case 1:         
00318                                 {
00319                                         float f = ( e [ p-2 ] );
00320                                         e[ p-2 ] = 0.0;
00321                                         for ( j = p-2; j >= k; --j )
00322                                         {
00323                                                 float t = hypot( _s[ j ], f );
00324                                                 float cs = _s[ j ] / t;
00325                                                 float sn = f / t;
00326                                                 _s[ j ] = t;
00327                                                 if ( j != k )
00328                                                 {
00329                                                         f = -sn * e[ j - 1 ];
00330                                                         e[ j - 1 ] = cs * e[ j - 1 ];
00331                                                 }
00332                                                 if ( wantv )
00333                                                 {
00334                                                         for ( i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00335                                                         {
00336                                                                 t = cs * _V( i, j ) + sn * _V( i, p - 1 );
00337                                                                 _V( i, p - 1 ) = -sn * _V( i, j ) + cs * _V( i, p - 1 );
00338                                                                 _V( i, j ) = t;
00339                                                         }
00340                                                 }
00341                                         }
00342                                 }
00343                                 break;
00344 
00345                         case 2:         
00346                                 {
00347                                         float f = e[ k - 1 ];
00348                                         e[ k - 1 ] = 0.0f;
00349                                         for ( j = k; j < p; ++j )
00350                                         {
00351                                                 float t = hypot( _s[ j ], f );
00352                                                 float cs = _s[ j ] / t;
00353                                                 float sn = f / t;
00354                                                 _s[ j ] = t;
00355                                                 f = -sn * e[ j ];
00356                                                 e[ j ] = cs * e[ j ];
00357                                                 if ( wantu )
00358                                                 {
00359                                                         for ( i = 0; i < m; ++i )
00360                                                         {
00361                                                                 t = cs * _U[ i ][ j ] + sn * _U[ i ][ k - 1 ];
00362                                                                 _U[ i ][ k - 1 ] = -sn * _U[ i ][ j ] + cs * _U[ i ][ k - 1 ];
00363                                                                 _U[ i ][ j ] = t;
00364                                                         }
00365                                                 }
00366                                         }
00367                                 }
00368                                 break;
00369 
00370                         case 3:         
00371                                 {
00373 //                                      float scale = Max( Max( Max( Max(
00374 //                                                 Abs( _s[ p - 1 ] ), Abs( _s[ p - 2 ] ) ), Abs( e[ p - 2 ] ) ), 
00375 //                                                 Abs( _s[ k ] ) ), Abs( e[ k ] ) );
00376                                         float scale = AbsMax5( _s[ p - 1 ], _s[ p - 2 ], e[ p - 2 ], _s[ k ], e[ k ] );
00377                                         float sp = _s[ p - 1 ] / scale;
00378                                         float spm1 = _s[ p - 2] / scale;
00379                                         float epm1 = e[ p - 2 ] / scale;
00380                                         float sk = _s[ k ] / scale;
00381                                         float ek = e[ k ] / scale;
00382                                         float b = ( ( spm1 + sp ) * ( spm1 - sp ) + epm1 * epm1 ) / 2.0f;
00383                                         float c = ( sp * epm1 ) * ( sp * epm1 );
00384                                         float shift = 0.0f;
00385                                         if ( ( b != 0.0f ) || ( c != 0.0f ) )
00386                                         {
00387                                                 shift = Sqrt( b*b + c );
00388                                                 if ( b < 0.0 )
00389                                                         shift = -shift;
00390                                                 shift = c/(b + shift);
00391                                         }
00392                                         float f = ( sk + sp ) * ( sk - sp ) + shift;
00393                                         float g = sk * ek;
00394 
00396                                         for ( j = k; j < p-1; ++j )
00397                                         {
00398                                                 float t = hypot( f, g );
00399                                                 float cs = f / t;
00400                                                 float sn = g / t;
00401                                                 if ( j != k )
00402                                                 {
00403                                                         e[ j - 1 ] = t;
00404                                                 }
00405                                                 f = cs * _s[ j ] + sn * e[ j ];
00406                                                 e[ j ] = cs * e[ j ] - sn * _s[ j ];
00407                                                 g = sn * _s[ j + 1 ];
00408                                                 _s[ j + 1 ] = cs * _s[ j + 1 ];
00409                                                 if ( wantv )
00410                                                 {
00411                                                         for ( i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00412                                                         {
00413                                                                 t = cs*_V( i, j ) + sn * _V( i, j + 1 );
00414                                                                 _V( i, j + 1 ) = -sn * _V( i, j ) + cs * _V( i, j + 1 );
00415                                                                 _V( i, j ) = t;
00416                                                         }
00417                                                 }
00418                                                 t = hypot( f, g );
00419                                                 cs = f / t;
00420                                                 sn = g / t;
00421                                                 _s[ j ] = t;
00422                                                 f = cs * e[ j ] + sn * _s[ j + 1 ];
00423                                                 _s[ j + 1 ] = -sn * e[ j ] + cs * _s[ j + 1 ];
00424                                                 g = sn * e[ j + 1 ];
00425                                                 e[ j + 1] = cs * e[ j + 1 ];
00426                                                 if ( wantu && ( j < m - 1 ) )
00427                                                 {
00428                                                         for (i = 0; i < m; ++i )
00429                                                         {
00430                                                                 t = cs * _U[ i ][ j ] + sn * _U[ i ][ j + 1 ];
00431                                                                 _U[ i ][ j + 1 ] = -sn * _U[ i ][ j ] + cs * _U[ i ][ j + 1 ];
00432                                                                 _U[ i ][ j ] = t;
00433                                                         }
00434                                                 }
00435                                         }
00436                                         e[p-2] = f;
00437                                         iter = iter + 1;
00438                                 }
00439                                 break;
00440 
00441                         case 4:         
00442                                 {
00443 
00445                                         if ( _s[ k ] <= 0.0f )
00446                                         {
00448                                                 _s[ k ] = ( _s[ k ] < 0.0f ? -_s[ k ] : 0.0f );
00449                                                 if ( wantv )
00450                                                 {
00451                                                         for ( i = 0; i <= pp; ++i )
00452                                                                 _V( i, k ) = -_V( i, k );
00453                                                 }
00454                                         }
00455 
00457                                         while ( k < pp )
00458                                         {
00459                                                 if ( _s[ k ] >= _s[ k + 1 ] )
00460                                                         break;
00461                                                 float t = _s[ k ];
00462                                                 _s[ k ] = _s[ k + 1 ];
00463                                                 _s[ k + 1 ] = t;
00464                                                 if ( wantv && ( k < n - 1 ) )
00465                                                 {
00466                                                         for ( i = 0; i < n; ++i )
00467                                                         {
00468                                                                 t = _V( i, k+1 );
00469                                                                 _V( i, k+1 ) = _V( i, k );
00470                                                                 _V( i, k ) = t;
00471                                                         }
00472                                                 }
00473                                                 if ( wantu && ( k < m - 1 ) )
00474                                                 {
00475                                                         for ( i = 0; i < m; ++i )
00476                                                         {
00477                                                                 t = _U[ i ][ k + 1 ];
00478                                                                 _U[ i ][ k + 1 ] = _U[ i ][ k ];
00479                                                                 _U[ i ][ k ] = t;
00480                                                         }
00481                                                 }
00482                                                 ++k;
00483                                         }
00484                                         iter = 0;
00485                                         --p;
00486                                 }
